title: Riot we need a CDR & mana Option for AP Mid's besides Morello's and Grail.
body:
For those Games where you don't need the Magic resist of Grail at all, or the Morello's Passive (Because Morello's totally isn't enough mana for certain Champions and wasting money on the MR stats just to have a Grail and the mana boost on kill/assist passive sucks).

Maybe an AD Countering version of Grail? It is Unholy, I know but I personally don't like Archangels, preferring early aggression (I take Double Doran's on a lot of Mages) and feel a lot of Money is wasted on Morello's and in building the stats you lose a lot of Early game - and often it's the only CDR & mana option suitable (if you aren't versing a lot of magic damage if any substantial magic damage at all) and Mikael's stats really don't live up to AP Mid's requirements.

I think an AD vs'ing CDR & mana item could be balanced (without ruining AD's early game too much where they need to be able to farm and trade with you) but with a decent mana pool late game for Champions who need the CDR and mana for quick bursty pushes down mid 
(Ahri, Azir, maybe Morgana - etc) and maybe even another AD CDR item could be added to balance this out, with a tanky heal/time item and maybe a heal shred item for supports that isn't so mana intensive and maybe some form of hybrid AP or sustain type item for AD/AP assassin (IE spell vamp on an AD item and lifesteal on an AP item or something like that).

I don't know, I think it's worth a thought as I've found AP Mids often need this form of item and the other item types I  mentioned might help balance it out.
